description.narrative: The association will organize working sessions with different partners and several local parties (women, in particular young women,national and local public institutions, civil society organizations and municipal members and other organizations working on gender) in order to work on a mobile app intended to women that contains all relevant information on their rights, but also additional useful information (see below) . A mobile app will be developed and will contains simplified information on women's social, economic and political rights. It also contains a list of relevant parties who can be contacted in case of emergency or to request assistance and obtain information. The app contains information on local events for women, job opportunities, training, grants, etc., mainly at the local level. The association will also run awareness raising campaigns directly, moving around certain regions and by organizingmini-dialogues with women to make them aware of the challenges and to introduce the applicationand how to use it in their family environment, or indirectly by introducing the application on the Internet , especially on social media with ambition to deliver it to as many people as possible, before holding a final workshop to present the applicationto all involved parties.

participating-org.narrative: The association has been working since its founding in 2012 to provide services and implement projects for the benefit of the inhabitants of Tataouine and the entire south-eastern region of Tunisia, due to the belief of its founders in the importance therole of civil society in overcoming political, social and economic challenges and their desire to engage in volunteering for the benefit of the local community. Where the association works to draw the attention of decision-makers and concerned and responsible parties to the damage and problems that surround the region, especially for fragile teams such as rural women, young people and poor families, and for make a positive contribution by offering effective means and innovation in the work of the association. The association seeks,by helping to find constructive solutions for the preservation of the environment, to create employment opportunities in accordancewith the principles of sustainable development and to stabilize the population and reduce organized and unorganized migration.

mailing-address.narrative: PO box 30919, 2500 GX The Hague, The Netherlands

sector.narrative: The right to social and political participation

description.narrative: CSOs representing excluded and marginalised individuals have strengthened capacity and maintain and expand their civic space.
